website_summaries.verdict: Inexpensive option – the set includes both front and rear boots – with a lot of converts.
pros: Vented neoprene sports boot helps keep legs cool
Close-fitting without causing rubbing or pinching
Boots stay put without slipping and come with three tough Velcro closures
Wide range of bright colors look good
cons: Velcro is stiff and a bit too extreme, making it very tough to undo

customer_reviews.title: Have not held up
customer_reviews.text: I have had these boots for one year or less. My horse wears them for turnout, but he is not very active and does not "kick up his heels'". Even though the velcro is extremely tough, (and hard to undo), the boots have not held up. The lining is coming apart from the shell, and they fall down. This review is subsequent to my prior review in which I was quite satisfied, but it only took about 3 months for them to start coming apart. I am not sure if they have a warranty.
customer_reviews.author: C. Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy and Made Well
customer_reviews.text: These are a great buy! They seem to be made well (time will tell) and are easy to use. I ordered a medium and it fit my 15.1 Tb/QH perfectly. They were a little big (too much overlap on her finer bones) on my 13.3 hand QH and a little small (barely made it around her thicker cannon and fetlock and a bit short on the hinds) on my 15.2 Warmblood cross. Hope that helps you get an idea on sizing. Overall loved the boots and will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Can’t get mine to stay in place. Hard to clean.
customer_reviews.text: I have watched tutorials to be sure I’m putting them on right and checked sizing, but these slip down my horses’ legs significantly during use. To the point of my needing to adjust them during the rides. I have stopped using them as a result. Bummer as I was very excited about these. Also note, these are probably not a great option for trail rides as weeds, stickers, etc. really stick to the fabric - it’s maddening to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Natalee

customer_reviews.title: Good boot, might be better if offered in XS
customer_reviews.text: Very VERY bright compared to photo (bought pink). They don't make her sweat too much which is great. Super strong Velcro, my horse is small/thin legs, so I really have to make sure they're on snug to avoid slouching - have a pair of pro choice that I never had to worry about, they were slightly smaller though.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Kallmeyer

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I was very satisfied with these boots. They were considerably less money (About $45.00) than the SMBII which I have bought in the past. They fit well and are of heavy material and I've had no problem with seams that weren't sewn properly. As others wrote the velcro is REALLY STRONG!!!!!!!!! So be prepared to use some finger strength. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because I saw that they were made in China and I prefer to shop American and I think the SMBII are made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: susan waddell

customer_reviews.title: Don’t fit correctly; correct size.
customer_reviews.text: These boots are pretty, and they arrived very promptly, but they DO NOT FIT the contour of the horse’s legs, especially in the rear. They gap at the fetlock. The fit is so bad that the instructor stopped a jumping lesson to remove them! Since they were only used once, I cannot address durability or sturdiness issues. I will say that the Velcro grips very tighly.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen

customer_reviews.title: Only left boots
customer_reviews.text: The boots themselves are very nice; however I haven’t been able to use them because I have only been sent Left front/hind boots. Even after return the next pair was again only left front/hind boots. This will be my second return in hopes of getting the complete set of Right front/hind & left front/hind. Such a headache and very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Great sport boot
customer_reviews.text: These boots are a vibrant bright pink and very pretty! As always, they are excellent quality and a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Mikkelson

customer_reviews.title: Super Clingy Velcro! a Nice  fit!
customer_reviews.text: I like these and the Velcro is super intense, so intense that when trying to open them up to put them on my horse the seams actually want to pull apart because the Velcro pulls so hard at the seams... However I also think it is a good thing that the Velcro clings as well as it does so that they don't come loose while riding. I am hoping that the Seams hold up long term!
customer_reviews.author: Charnea

customer_reviews.title: The boot themselves are good but the inflexibility of the velcro strap makes them ...
customer_reviews.text: The very first time we used this set, on one of the front boots, the lowest strap started to rip. The velcro part of the strap is hard and not flexible and while making a turn on the barrel the horse lightly clipped the front inside of the other boot and the velcro did not withstand the impact because it is too stiff. The boot themselves are good but the inflexibility of the velcro strap makes them difficult to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jewlz

customer_reviews.title: Durable. Fit is mediocre.
customer_reviews.text: The velcro is very strong! The material feels very strong and durable. I have used these almost daily for months now and they are still intact. I will say the fit is a bit weird. The boot doesn't wrap as nice and pretty as it shows in the picture. And they slide down some if it is hot out and they're not on tight.
customer_reviews.author: Shelsea101

customer_reviews.title: to Good to be true! All boots front and back were lefty’s !!😤
customer_reviews.text: I received the item quickly, and waited awhile before I opened and used them only to find out that I only got left boots for front and back...useless to me!! I want my money back!!!
customer_reviews.author: Aj Serba

customer_reviews.title: looks great with my bell boots
customer_reviews.text: looks great with my bell boots. 4 Velcro straps make it very secure. doesn't have the padding on the inside like my other sport boots.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Velcro holds too well.
customer_reviews.text: Gives the support you'd expect out of a sport boot.. The Velcro is a pain, it holds too good and is hard to undo.. But at least is stays in place, my horses have been comfortable in them.
customer_reviews.author: Pepper

customer_reviews.title: Terrible designed fit of lower support strap
customer_reviews.text: Purchase as backup to keep in horse trailer. Recently started using. Lower support strap does not hold fetlock portion of boot in place. Lower support strap slips down while fetlock portion of boot slips up. Terrible design compared to professionals choice and / or classic equine. Will pay the extra money next time for the leading brand name. Please credit purchase price so I can replace.
customer_reviews.author: Terri L Butler

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am super happy with this product. The Velcro is really grippy and they work fantastic. Great buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth

customer_reviews.title: HAPPY HAPPY HAPPY
customer_reviews.text: THE BEST YOUR MONEY CAN BUY... 100% RECOMENDED... VERY WELL CONTRUCTED AS THEY BRAND STATES: THEY ARE TOUGH, VELCRO DOSEN'T COME LOOSE THAT EASY SO THEY WON'T FALL OFF... LIKE THEM A LOT...
customer_reviews.author: Rodolfo S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the Price.
customer_reviews.text: These boots are great for the price. On the other hand, they're a bit hard to get off when it's cold and you have gloves on as they are very stretchy.
customer_reviews.author: F.E. ArlissTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Great product and fit for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great product and fit for the money! I will likely never buy the other "name brands" again and pay double! Don't see why I should...
customer_reviews.author: Phillip J.

customer_reviews.title: Larger than expected and color was neon- not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Larger than expected- and color was neon - not as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice boots. I ordered mediums, 3 were medium and 1 was a small.
customer_reviews.author: Canchaser4ever

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and don’t fit right. Flimsy and hard to put on
customer_reviews.author: JORELL SCHRAMEK

customer_reviews.title: I like these, and maybe this is nitpicking
customer_reviews.text: I like these, and maybe this is nitpicking, but the velcro is incredibly tight! It's really hard to get apart and then, once I do, the pieces want to reconnect. It's just kind of frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: danaraymond

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: No rubbing or pinching. The Velcro really works. Great support. Easy to clean. These are our second pair. She outgrew her first pair.
customer_reviews.author: rxm13

customer_reviews.title: Nice Boots!
customer_reviews.text: The Velcro works amazing. They are cozy and the mediums fit my 16hh Paint horse really well. Here's hoping that they hold up well over time!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Hart

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: My horse kicks so I haven’t been able to use these 😭
customer_reviews.author: Christina Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Second order, Both 4lefts boots
customer_reviews.text: This is our second order, and both time we have received a set of four left boots. Seems to be a decent quality of boots, the packaging of the product is the problem.
customer_reviews.author: K. L. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Good sport boots
customer_reviews.text: Nice sport boots. Fit is good for my AQHA gelding, he is 14.3/15HH & I purchased a medium. I knocked a star off for lack of labeling on each boot and as others have written the stiffness of the Velcro. Have only used them a handful of times but so far they have held up well.
customer_reviews.author: JohnDeereChick

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy... maybe a little too much
customer_reviews.text: Nicely built boot. Be warned that the velcro is so sticky that I had to resew one seam on each boot. Otherwise a very good product.Strong support.
customer_reviews.author: G. Alan Joel

customer_reviews.title: Love them. And they are appropriately named - tough ...
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 sets of these. Love them. And they are appropriately named - tough one.
customer_reviews.author: wagonmaster

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Work great, very light on horse. I think they run a bit small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the best.
customer_reviews.text: Ripped tore after a few days. My draft horse was not being worked when she had them on, just tried them out for a few days while grazing and having days off and they began to rip etc.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: I've never tried the Tough 1 boots before and I ...
customer_reviews.text: I've never tried the Tough 1 boots before and I must say, I'm not a fan. They just don't seem to fit well on my horses so I'll stick with my SMB IIs.
customer_reviews.author: Kandace Karnath

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: besides my horse looking awesome she is also protected and they fit perfect.Third pair I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I put these on every time I ride. They give good support and don't leave the legs really sweaty. They are damp when removed but not like the other boots I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: khanks4

customer_reviews.title: 4 left feet
customer_reviews.text: received this product right before leaving on a week long riding /camping trip went to put them on all left front reet had to use them no choice but very disappointed in the qa/qc of this item really all left feet .
customer_reviews.author: philip cipoletta

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice heavy Velcro. Our smaller mule fit in the small size perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The materials are great quality but the design could be improved
customer_reviews.text: The materials are great quality but the design could be improved. If you have a horse that travels close behind don't bother buying these boots. The bottom velcro closure wraps around to the inside and after my horse brushed his hind legs for one week both closures came off and now the back boots are unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Coryn

customer_reviews.title: Velcro is SUPER difficult
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my horse. And the Velcro is damn near impossible for me to undo..even had my friends dad help and he struggled.
customer_reviews.author: brittney kentner

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a Great product for the money although the size on the ones I received do run a little larger.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Whitcomb

customer_reviews.title: we were very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: we were very happy with this purchase. The Medium was a perfect fit for a 16H Appaloosa. The Velcro Straps are great, very strong. I would definitely buy these again and recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Cavenaugh

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: great price- good fit for an Azteca and Iberian Warmblood
customer_reviews.author: World Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Yellow tent, not white
customer_reviews.text: I have these on red, and love them, I ordered white, it’s the vented ones, they are not white, they are yellow tinted
customer_reviews.author: Misty D Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product for the price. They keep his legs safe and add extra stabilization.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The Velcro is nice and sticky, which is useful. They seem to be holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for protecting the horses legs. The horse likes them too.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I’d buy these again!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used Professional Choice boots and I have to say I like the way these fit much more. I feel like they support and wear well - they don’t slide at all.
customer_reviews.author: Rey Zuka

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots but the velcro flaps are really hard to ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice boots but the velcro flaps are really hard to undo and some of the stitching is loose and I haven't used them yet .
customer_reviews.author: Pamela R Newton

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good Quality, much better price than SMB boots. Good bright color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2 Left
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. Super excited to receive and use on my horse, but have to return because I received 2 left splint boots.
customer_reviews.author: J. Melton

customer_reviews.title: NEON PINK
customer_reviews.text: only used a few times, but beware these boots are neon pink, not the pink depicted in the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Sorrell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are so well made- you just can't beat the value for the price on these!!
customer_reviews.author: Amelia T.

customer_reviews.title: All Left Boots
customer_reviews.text: Two times now I have only got all left boots>>>>
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price they're great! After about a month of using them daily I see a few loose strings, and there Velcro roughs up the boot a little. Overall​ they're a great work boot. Fit true and looked cute!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the color and the fit
customer_reviews.text: These are great boots! I love the color and the fit!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer TC

customer_reviews.title: Eh.
customer_reviews.text: They're nice and all but we're all labeled to be for left legs even though there were both front and rear right and left. So weird.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: Very good manufactured, looks made of high quality materials, fit good the horse, allows natural movements ! Good for daily use, using them when releasing horses in pastures as well.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Valencia

customer_reviews.title: Great boots for support!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Easy to put on, but feel sturdy and secure.
customer_reviews.author: Mixed_Chik

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Poor quility, received 2 sets of rears instead of front and rear, poor customer service
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome boots! My horse loves them. Snug fit, as well as breathable!
customer_reviews.author: Noel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit the horse and work fine, daughter likes em, recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kickstand

customer_reviews.title: They fit great and the velcro is very secure
customer_reviews.text: These boots are nicer than I expected. They fit great and the velcro is very secure.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Haskin

customer_reviews.title: Best sport boots
customer_reviews.text: My horse frequently over reaching when barrel racing, constantly leaving nasty cuts on his legs, both front and back. As with most horse owners, I've been through dozens of boots, usually ending with broken Velcro, but also torn stitching, stretched material, etc. The Velcro on these is so amazing, it's stronger than any other Velcro I've had on boots. The fit is perfect and the stitching is done well. MY horse is not bothered by having them on. They don't pinch, they don't turn, they don't loosen. Best sport boots I've used to date. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Strong Velcro and they look like they’re good quality but I’ll have to return them
customer_reviews.text: I was sent 2 Left front boots... Strong Velcro and they look like they’re good quality but I’ll have to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Smolski

customer_reviews.title: Beauty is... Annoyance?
customer_reviews.text: The front set fit great but the back set- not so much. They are very hard to fit fully around my thoroughbreds hinds and they also slip and almost crinkle every time I use them. Besides the inconveniences- the red set of 4 looks absolutey stunning on my dark bay!
customer_reviews.author: Alexa Kerigan

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product.
customer_reviews.text: We received one set of boots and the stitching on the velcro came apart. The seller replaced them with a new set that did the same thing. Not a good product.
customer_reviews.author: hollyho

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in this product
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this product. Both back boots have broken and come apart in less than three months only using them twice a week.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Stantcheva

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! Got here much faster then anticipated and they look great. Velcro is very strong and my horse has so much more support. My 16hh OTQH wears a med and they fit great!! And the red is so bright!! They're definitely worth it and I spent less then half the amount I would have buying a front and rear set. Would highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Beal

customer_reviews.title: Great quality - sizing is questionable
customer_reviews.text: Very much like the more expensive SMB boots, but these were marked 'draft size' and were too small for our very average draft stallion. Probably more likely a fit for a warmblood. Very nice quality and fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: EPS, PC

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like them but I had to send them back. because I only got left side boots.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: The product looked nice. Price was good. Came in a timely fashion. However, the first time we took them off they fell apart. The seams came out of the Velcro leaving them mostly useless.
customer_reviews.author: Gina McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: As described, but haven't had a chance to use them yet.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Mahenski

customer_reviews.title: Love Em!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought these boots before, but found the best price on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Gramma

customer_reviews.title: Extream Vented Boots Excellent Choice
customer_reviews.text: Excellent boots for the price. The velcro is very good. Sizing is correct.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Morton

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots for my quarter horse and they are awesome! What a great value. The quality is excellent and they fit very well too. The Velcro is very sturdy almost too sturdy but no more worry about the Velcro coming undone. I ordered the pink color and there was no swatch to look at online so I was surprised to pull them out of the bag and find fluorescent pink but they dirty up anyways. Awesome value for all 4 boots with great quality. I will be saving more money by buying Tough 1 products again!
customer_reviews.author: Countrygirl

customer_reviews.title: Heat boots. Came fast and new. I have ...
customer_reviews.text: Heat boots. Came fast and new. I have been using them for months now and still work and look brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Kaiya stripp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome price and awesome protection by this brand ! Loved the color as well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the quality of the boot for such a great price. The Velcro is serious very strong
customer_reviews.author: Brandie Harrell

customer_reviews.title: NOT true to color pictured!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my best friends birthday gift. She's been wanting pure white boots for her QH mare, and that is shown in the picture. I just got these today, and they're off white with light gray polka dots! I'm extremely disappointed, especially for the price I paid. I don't have time to send them back and get a new set before her birthday. She will use them either way, but still. You expect to get what's in the picture...
customer_reviews.author: Kyra

customer_reviews.title: We were disappointed, but he did say that the Velcro works ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my husband for Christmas. We go to a roping and he puts the boots on his horse. He gets to looking at our horses legs after putting the boots on the horse and figures out we were sent 2 left front boots and 2 left right boots. We were disappointed, but he did say that the Velcro works really well. I have ordered replacement boots and I am sending the others back. So we shall see if they get it right this time.
customer_reviews.author: bkh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the boots...velcro on them is very sticky fit my horse perfect :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are very well made at half the price of others.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Knight

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptic about these boots because of the price and it turns out I was right. As soon as I opened the package I noticed they were flimsy and had very little protective padding. When I put them on my horse they were useless. You'll get what you pay for, and I'll stick with SMBII
customer_reviews.author: Katie L

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy not cheap quality and the gave me a little something extra i assume it was the shipper.
customer_reviews.author: rodrigomejia

customer_reviews.title: Haven't even tried them yet...
customer_reviews.text: My pony had rain rot on his legs when I first bought him and now that it's cleared up his legs area chronically covered in skunk weed at his boarding facility. So I still haven't even tried these out yet. No I don't neglect my animals LOL So still haven't tried these but the velcro is hard core and they were a good price if you want all 4.
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with these boots! Look good and are very supportive!
customer_reviews.author: Kirsty Michell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They had fast shipping. The boots fit perfectly. And hold up well
customer_reviews.author: madison

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super happy, My Mom loves them and her horse looks AMAZING in them.
customer_reviews.author: tyler coltrin

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Because of all of the reviews that said if you have a medium sized horse you need large boots I got the large boots for my horses. The large boots fit my 15-2 hand horse, my 16 hand horse and could still fit a bigger horse and just fit my 14-3 hand horse. They did not fit my 14 hand horse he needed the medium boots. I am very pleased with these boots and will be buying more when I need them.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Leiter

customer_reviews.title: great product very horse friendly
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots and so does my horse. The Velcro is sewn on well and all the attachment points are in convient places. They clean up well in the washer and there doesn't seem to be any fading from washing them multiple times.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great fit & color but durability is lacking
customer_reviews.text: While the fit and color were great, these boots are just not holding up. So far quite a bit of stitching is coming undone on the boots, I have only used about 5-6 times. Unfortunately my return time is passed ... would not buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Caitín

customer_reviews.title: Great boots WRONG COLOR
customer_reviews.text: Tough -1 boots are great but these are NOT bubble gum pink like pictured . So beware they are hot hot pink it's annoying when seller post the with color pic it's just a waste of time and good luck fighting to get the shipping reimbursed ~
customer_reviews.author: jessica s

customer_reviews.title: I haven't used them yet. They are not white ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used them yet. They are not white but an off white. Not sure I'm going to keep them. The picture shows them looking white but they are not.
customer_reviews.author: class2canoe

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny put into them. They have the best Velcro whom any equestrian could ask for. Love the color, I bought a blue pair for my bay paint and she looks super good in them. I also like the size of them, they don't go far up her legs or to low past the fetlock. AND THEY COME IN A PACKAGE OF FOUR!!! It's rare to find a high quality boot that's affordable and trusty.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: We used them 4 times and one of the Velcro ...
customer_reviews.text: We used them 4 times and one of the Velcro straps ripped. I was hoping they would be a bit more hardy.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: One of the boots ripped at the seams the first time I undid the velcro. Boots shifted while riding. Quite disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: bbsad1

product_meta.title: Tough 1 Extreme Vented Sport Boots Set
product_meta.description: New improved design, form fitting Extreme Vented Sport Boots, with an even closer contour fit, lightweight, less bulk. Air-flow perforated neoprene to allow the leg to breathe, releasing heat, three strong "quick grip" closures make these boots easy to put on correctly every time. Easy to clean, fits like a second skin to protect your equine athlete while keeping dirt out.
feature_bullets: Form fitting Extreme Vented Sport Boots with an even closer contour fit
Air-flow perforated neoprene to allow the leg to breathe by releasing heat
Three strong "quick grip" closures make these boots easy to put on correctly every time
Fits like a second skin to protect your equine athlete while keeping dirt out

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
